oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Grace McKinley walking her daughter, Linda Gail McKinley to Fehr Elementary School, Nashville, Tennessee, 1957 September 09
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Grace McKinley escorting her daughter Linda Gail McKinley (second girl) and a friend to Fehr Elementary School, corner of Fifth Avenue and Garfield Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 9 September 1957. Mrs. McKinley walks through an irate crowd of segregationists carrying picket signs and protestors of public school desegregation. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: McKinley, Grace; McKinley, Linda Gail
Fehr Elementary School (Nashville, Tenn.)
